Reviews.Title: Very Good but need more RAM
Reviews.Author: Andrey
Reviews.Content: The cellphone work very good and the apps and games run excelent and fast but with many open apps the ram memory dont help to dual core processor

Reviews.Title: cute phone
Reviews.Author: Honesty
Reviews.Content: So I ordered this phone because my samsung galaxy s2 ringer dose not work anymore so I had no ideal about these phones until I was on youtube one day and saw a video of this phone customer service is very nice here they forgot to send my other battery so I contacted them and it got here in no time the phone they sent me the screen is coming up a little bit but ima take it to best buy and get it fixed

Reviews.Title: not so happy
Reviews.Author: LaToya J.
Reviews.Content: I received the phone fast but the phone shut down and would not turn back on. Needs a update on software as well as far as android is concerned.
